processClaim: [W]We aim to process your claim by

rejection.header: [W]The tribunal has rejected all or part of your claim

respondentReceived.header: [W]The tribunal has received a response from the respondent
respondentReceived.p1: [W]We will process the response and contact you soon to tell you what will happen next.

respondentRejection.header: [W]The tribunal has rejected the respondent's response.

respondentAcknowledgement.header: [W]The tribunal has acknowledged the respondent's response.

respondentApplicationReceived.p1TypeB: [W]You do not need to respond to this application.

ecc.title: [W]The tribunal has sent you a notification:

orderOrRequest.responseRequired: [W]The tribunal requires some information from you.
orderOrRequest.noResponseRequired: [W]The tribunal has sent you a notification

judgment.header: [W]The tribunal has made a decision on your case.

decisionJudgment.headerClaimant: [W]The tribunal has made a decision on your application to
decisionJudgment.headerRespondent: [W]The tribunal has made a decision on the respondent's application to

storedPending.header: [W]You have stored correspondence which you have not submitted to the tribunal
storedPending.line1: [W]You must send a copy of this correspondence and all supporting documents to the other party before you submit it to the tribunal.
storedPending.line2: [W]If the other party does respond to your application, they are expected to copy their response to you.

title.rule92Yes: [W]You have sent a response to the tribunal and copied it to the respondent.

rule92No.p1: [W]You have sent a response to the tribunal and given your reasons not to copy it to the respondent.
rule92No.p2: [W]The tribunal will consider your reasons and let you know what happens next.

multiples.groupClaim: [W]Your claim is part of a group claim
multiples.designated: [W]Your individual case is designated the lead case in a group claim. You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
multiples.stayed: [W]Your individual claim is stayed. The group claim will progress. You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
multiples.nonLead: [W]You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
